contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW", this 10th day of April 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the question of whether the five-year statute of limitations provided in 77 P.S. § 1039.12 or the default two-year statute of limitations provided in 42 Pa.C.S. § 5552 applies to prosecutions for offenses under 77 P.S. § 501?
Justice FITZGERALD did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
